name: Zinio Electronic Magazine File
summary: Learn about .ZNO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Zinio publications that require user subscriptions incorporate DRM copy-protection. This ensures the magazines can only be viewed on authorized computers.

description: Digital magazine format used for saving and distributing electronic versions of magazines and other publications; maintains all the formatting, text, and graphics from the original publication; can be viewed page by page like an actual magazine.
